author: Andrej-CMS
body:
Dear all,
these are common Herwig7 settings that allow to write very simple Herwig7 configs for users. 
For example GeneratorInterface/Herwig7Interface/python/Herwig7_loadCommonMergingSettings_cff.py
I will update the Twiki soon.
Kind regards,
Andrej

#### PR validation:
PR was validated with local runs, where the output in attached. Especially testing the capability of the  'set theLHReader:AllowedToReOpen No' option to make sure that the LHE events don't get processed more than one time.
[JME-RunIIFall18wmLHEGS-00027.txt](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/2946876/JME-RunIIFall18wmLHEGS-00027.txt)
title: Herwig7 common configs to make writing easier
